situation.title: Accommodations
situation.meta_description: The operation of hotels and other accommodation services is limited.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

The operation of hotels and other accommodation services is presently limited. Accommodation services can be provided only for:

  • business-related purposes (business trips),
  • individuals who have been ordered with work duty,
  • individuals who have been ordered to stay in quarantine or self-isolation,
  • foreigners before their departure from the Czech Republic,
  • foreigners with valid work permit in the Czech Republic.

Private and recreational stays are not possible at present.

It is mandatory to wear a face mask in all public areas of any open accommodation service. Please pay increased attention to all hygienic rules and leave your hotel room only when necessary.

Hotel staff is obliged to carry out complete disinfection of the whole area regularly (especially door handles, halls, railings, elevators, toilets, etc.). It is also vital to take extra care to clean the rooms and handle towels and bedding in an appropriate way. These measures are designed to significantly lower the risk of infection for both staff and clients. By retaining all these high hygienic standards, we will be able to get sooner back to the normal.

Hotel restaurants are exempt from the general ban on the presence of the public in the restaurants. This exemption applies only for hotel guests. Hotel restaurants are granted to open from 5:00 to 22:59.

questions_answers.question: Am I obliged to wear a face mask in my hotel room?
Can I book a hotel room for a business trip purposes?
As a foreigner with work permission in the Czech Republic, am I able to book and stay in a hotel room?
Can I finish my hotel stay if it had started before the governmental regulations took place?
Being a hotel guest, can I stay in a hotel during my self-isolation?
questions_answers.value: Yes, we advise you to follow specific hotel conditions.

questions_answers.question: Can I eat in a hotel restaurant during my stay?
questions_answers.value: Yes, please be aware that opening hours of the restaurant are limited from 5:00 to 22:59.

questions_answers.question: Can I stay in my cottage or country house?
questions_answers.value: Yes, you can stay in your own cottage or house. Please try to minimize contacts with locals if not necessary.

questions_answers.question: Does the supporting program “COVID-nájemné” apply to Airbnb rentals?
questions_answers.value: No, program does not cover non-business-related rentals.

questions_answers.question: Does the supporting program “COVID-nájemné” apply to apartments being registered as a place of business?
questions_answers.value: Only in the case of “živnost volná” (self-employment without special requirements). Specifically, accommodation services with mandatory registration of the leased space as a place of business which were closed based on government restrictions.
